Michigan

Cryptocurrency-focused PACs have spent
$11,164,174
to influence 2024 elections in Michigan

By race

Senate

Protect Progress spent $10,046,680 to support Elissa Slotkin in the general election.
Elissa Slotkin won the general election.

House District 4

Defend American Jobs spent $107,352 to support Bill Huizenga in the general election.
Bill Huizenga won the general election.

House District 13

Protect Progress spent $1,010,142 to support Shri Thanedar in the Democratic primary.
Shri Thanedar won the general election.
